Who needs the Packposs?

Buyer

Start a new project with the world's leading manufacturer. You can compare the prices of different manufacturers and make the custom packaging reasonably.

Supplier

Don't focus on difficult marketing anymore, and meet buyer easily and conveniently through packposs.

The Best Partner for Your Custom Packaging

PACKPOSS is a custom packaging platform with professional team and worldwide packaging suppliers. Bring your ideas and create your custom packaging with us!

Compare Free Quotes

Just start with inquire for a quote you can compare quotes from 200 suppliers for free.

We delivers quick turn-around for all custom packaging needs from design to shipment

High-Quality

We offer High-Quality packaging with verified suppliers and experts.

Global Shipping

The products can be shipped anywhere in the world with door to door service.

How to proceed a new project?

  • Create a item
  • Request quote
  • Submit order

Create a item

Consider the various categories and specifications and build up with your own custom packaging.

Request quote

Select an item with sufficient specifications and request a quote with quantity, delivery.

Submit order

Choose one of the different manufacturers that submitted your quote and place an order.

Customized Folding carton box

Compare quotes from different manufacturers and start the project with a matched partner.

Customized Flexible pouches

Compare quotes from different manufacturers and start the project with a matched partner.

Try Packposs now

Create a new item and Get reasonable quotes.
